name: Cyber Light
description:
The Virtual nightmare starts

Cyber Light is a melee Focused FPS Game that takes you into the virtual world where the facility is filled with monsters and you are the one who will hunt down the chaos. The game contains 5 levels which are filled with monsters including a boss in the 5th level and with your arsenal with different powers you can use them in certain situations to deal more damage. The game dose take inspiration from Ultrakill and contains similar content like music, gameplay and Graphics.

How To Play 4 weapons to choose
1,2,3,4Special Attack 1
CSpecial Attack 2
Right Click
Special Attack 3RSpecial Attack 4QParry / Block
Hold X
DashLeft Shift
VaultLeft Control

Note: the keybindings except the 4 weapons keybindings can be changed ingame.

The game may contain bugs or some unfinished work.
